original_text:
Meanwhile, Absalom had fled.
Now the man standing watch looked up and saw many people on the road west of him, coming down the side of the hill. The watchman went and told the king, “I see men in the direction of Horonaim, on the side of the hill.”
korean_text: 이에 압살롬은 도망하니라 파수하는 청년이 눈을 들어 보니 보아라 뒷산 언덕길로 여러 사람이 오는도다

sentences.original_text: Now the man standing watch looked up
and saw many people on the road west of him,
sentences.korean_translation: 서쪽 길에 많은 사람들이 있는 것을 보았다.

sentences.original_text: coming down the side of the hill.
The watchman went and told the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 망을 보던 자가 가서 왕에게 말했다.

sentences.original_text: I see men in the direction of Horonaim,
on the side of the hill.
